description:

In fact, a hard R-rated movie just started trending on Disney [...]

description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has already given fans a trilogy of Captain America movies with Chris Evans as the titular character. However, we’ll soon be getting Captain America: Brave New World which places Anthony Mackie’s Sam Wilson under the Captain America mantle. Now fans can see Mackie in action as Wilson in the newly-released Captain [...]

title: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ First Trailer Released
